summary: Central estimate ~$31.3B for Q4 2025 EMEA constant currency revenue. Based on estimated Q4 2024 baseline of ~$28.1B and ~11.5% YoY growth.
content: Key inputs: Q3 2025 EMEA CC $28.65B (+11.84% YoY), Q4 2025 total revenue analyst estimate $111.4B (+15.5%), Q4 2024 total $96.47B. Estimated Q4 2024 EMEA CC ~$28.1B from annual $102.13B headline data. EMEA growth trails overall company (~12% vs 15%) due to faster Cloud/APAC growth. Q4 seasonal uplift from Q3 typically ~8-10% for EMEA. Monte Carlo with SD ~$0.9B gives P10=$30.2B, P50=$31.3B, P90=$32.5B.
